```{r}
com_graf <- read.csv2("compara_graficas.csv")
ing_real <- read.csv2("ingresosReales.csv")

require(dplyr)
ing_real <- ing_real %>% rename(valorReal = valor)
```


```{r}
require(tidyr)
com_graf1 <- com_graf %>% gather(graf, valor, -c(num, tipo))
com_graf1$graf <- factor(com_graf1$graf)

require(dplyr)
com_graf2 <- com_graf1 %>% full_join(ing_real, by = c("graf" = "figura"))
```

```{r}
require(ggplot2)
g1 <- ggplot(com_graf2, aes(graf, valor))
g1 + geom_jitter(width = 0.2) + facet_grid(. ~ tipo) +
     geom_hline(aes(yintercept = valorReal)) +
     stat_summary(fun.data=mean_sdl, 
                  col = "red", fun.args = list(mult = 1))
```

```{r}
require(dplyr)
com_graf3 <- com_graf2 %>% filter(graf == "B")

require(ggplot2)
g1 <- ggplot(com_graf3, aes(tipo, valor))
g1 + geom_jitter(width = 0.2) + 
     geom_hline(aes(yintercept = valorReal)) +
     stat_summary(fun.data=mean_sdl, 
                  col = "red", fun.args = list(mult = 1))+
     ggtitle("B")
```
